# 约会秘籍

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/yuehui-miji
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/yuehui-miji
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install yuehui-miji
yuehui-miji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g yuehui-miji
yuehui-miji <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
